medicines.usage: For relief of mild to moderate pain and fever
medicines.dosageAdult: 1-2 tablets (500-1000mg) every 4-6 hours as needed, maximum 4000mg/day
medicines.dosageChild: 10-15mg/kg every 4-6 hours, consult doctor for children under 2
medicines.dosageElderly: Same as adult, but monitor liver function
medicines.sideEffects: Rare when used as directed. May cause liver damage if taken in excess.
medicines.warnings: Do not take with other paracetamol-containing products. Avoid alcohol. Not recommended with liver disease.

symptomMappings.notes: Effective for mild to moderate headaches

medicines.usage: For pain, inflammation, and fever reduction
medicines.dosageChild: 5-10mg/kg every 6-8 hours for children over 6 months
medicines.dosageElderly: Lower dose recommended, monitor kidney function
medicines.sideEffects: Stomach upset, nausea, dizziness. May increase risk of bleeding.
medicines.warnings: Take with food. Not recommended for people with stomach ulcers, kidney disease, or on blood thinners.

symptomMappings.notes: Excellent for tension headaches and migraines

medicines.description: Pain reliever, fever reducer, and blood thinner
medicines.usage: For pain, fever, and heart protection
medicines.warnings: Not for children (Reye's syndrome risk). Avoid with stomach ulcers.

symptomMappings.notes: Good for muscle and joint pain

medicines.description: Potent NSAID for pain and inflammation
medicines.usage: For severe pain, arthritis, and inflammatory conditions
medicines.sideEffects: Stomach pain, nausea, increased risk of cardiovascular events
medicines.warnings: Use lowest effective dose. Not for long-term use without medical supervision.

medicines.usage: For chronic pain, arthritis, and menstrual cramps
medicines.warnings: May increase risk of heart attack and stroke. Take with food.

medicines.description: Opioid analgesic for moderate to severe pain
medicines.usage: For moderate to severe pain and persistent cough
medicines.warnings: High potential for abuse and dependence. Not for long-term use.

medicines.usage: For moderate to moderately severe pain
medicines.warnings: May cause seizures. Risk of dependence and serotonin syndrome.

symptomMappings.notes: Strong pain relief for severe aches
Effective for joint and nerve pain

medicines.description: Strong opioid analgesic for severe pain
medicines.usage: For severe pain, cancer pain, and post-operative pain
medicines.warnings: High potential for abuse. Only for severe pain under medical supervision.

medicines.description: Potent synthetic opioid for breakthrough pain
medicines.usage: For breakthrough cancer pain and severe chronic pain
medicines.warnings: Extremely potent. High abuse potential. Medical supervision required.

medicines.usage: For neuropathic pain, seizures, and nerve-related pain
medicines.warnings: May increase risk of suicidal thoughts. Do not stop abruptly.

medicines.usage: For neuropathic pain, fibromyalgia, and anxiety
medicines.warnings: May cause dizziness and drowsiness. Avoid alcohol.

medicines.usage: For chronic pain, migraines, and neuropathic pain
medicines.sideEffects: Dry mouth, drowsiness, constipation, weight gain
medicines.warnings: May cause suicidal thoughts. Not for people with heart conditions.

medicines.description: SNRI for chronic pain and depression
medicines.usage: For chronic musculoskeletal pain, fibromyalgia, and depression
medicines.warnings: May increase risk of suicidal thoughts. Monitor for serotonin syndrome.

medicines.usage: For cough and chest congestion
medicines.warnings: Less drowsy formula. Still use caution when driving.

medicines.usage: For relief of cough and cold symptoms
medicines.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery.

medicines.usage: For temporary relief of cough
medicines.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Avoid alcohol.

medicines.usage: For 12-hour cough relief
medicines.warnings: Extended-release formula. Take as directed.

medicines.usage: For loosening mucus and chest congestion
medicines.warnings: Drink plenty of water while taking this medication.

medicines.usage: For nasal congestion, runny nose, and sneezing
medicines.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Avoid alcohol. Not for people with high blood pressure.

medicines.usage: For nasal congestion and sinus pressure
medicines.warnings: May increase blood pressure. Not for people with heart conditions.

medicines.usage: For allergy symptoms including hay fever
medicines.warnings: Less drowsy than older antihistamines. Avoid alcohol.

medicines.usage: For seasonal allergies and hay fever
medicines.warnings: Generally well tolerated. Safe for most users.

medicines.usage: For seasonal allergies and chronic hives
medicines.warnings: Generally safe and well tolerated.

medicines.usage: For allergies, insomnia, and motion sickness
medicines.sideEffects: Significant drowsiness, dry mouth, blurred vision
medicines.warnings: Causes marked drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery.

symptomMappings.notes: Can help with sleep due to sedation

medicines.usage: For quick relief of asthma symptoms and breathing difficulties
medicines.dosageAdult: 1-2 puffs as needed, maximum 4 times daily
medicines.dosageChild: 1 puff as needed, consult doctor for children under 4
medicines.warnings: For emergency use only. Not for prevention. Seek medical help if symptoms worsen.

medicines.usage: For asthma and COPD symptoms
medicines.dosageChild: 1 puff every 4-6 hours for children over 4
medicines.warnings: For quick relief only. Not for maintenance therapy.

medicines.description: Combination inhaler for asthma and COPD
medicines.usage: For maintenance and relief of asthma and COPD symptoms
medicines.warnings: Contains steroid. Rinse mouth after use.

medicines.usage: For long-term control of asthma symptoms
medicines.warnings: Not for sudden asthma attacks. Contains steroid.

medicines.usage: For maintenance treatment of COPD
medicines.warnings: For long-term use only. Not for acute symptoms.

medicines.description: Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux
medicines.usage: For heartburn, acid reflux, and stomach ulcers
medicines.warnings: Long-term use may increase fracture risk. Not for immediate relief.

symptomMappings.notes: May help with nausea from acid reflux

medicines.usage: For gastroesophageal reflux disease and ulcers
medicines.warnings: May increase risk of bone fractures. Long-term use requires monitoring.

medicines.usage: For frequent heartburn and acid reflux
medicines.warnings: Not for immediate relief. 14-day limit without doctor consultation.

medicines.usage: For heartburn, acid indigestion, and sour stomach
medicines.warnings: May contain NDMA (carcinogen). Check for recalls.

medicines.usage: For heartburn, acid indigestion, and GERD
medicines.warnings: Generally safe for short-term use.

medicines.description: H2 blocker for ulcers and heartburn
medicines.usage: For ulcers, heartburn, and acid reflux
medicines.warnings: Many drug interactions. Check with pharmacist.

medicines.usage: For heartburn, acid indigestion, and GERD
medicines.warnings: May interfere with other medications. Take separately.

medicines.usage: For heartburn, acid indigestion, and upset stomach
medicines.warnings: Take as needed. Not for long-term use.

medicines.usage: For heartburn and acid indigestion
medicines.dosageChild: 1-2 tablets as needed for children over 6
medicines.warnings: May cause kidney stones with long-term use.

medicines.usage: For diarrhea, indigestion, and upset stomach
medicines.warnings: May cause Reye's syndrome in children. Contains salicylate.

medicines.usage: For acute diarrhea and traveler's diarrhea
medicines.dosageAdult: 2mg after first loose stool, then 1mg after each subsequent stool
medicines.warnings: Not for bacterial infections. Stop if fever develops.

medicines.usage: For severe diarrhea
medicines.warnings: Contains atropine. Potential for abuse.

medicines.description: Antibiotic for bacterial and parasitic infections
medicines.usage: For bacterial infections and certain parasitic infestations
medicines.warnings: Avoid alcohol completely during treatment. May cause dark urine.

medicines.usage: For bacterial infections of respiratory tract, ears, skin
medicines.dosageElderly: Same as adult, monitor kidney function
medicines.warnings: Complete full course even if feeling better. May cause allergic reactions.

medicines.usage: For resistant bacterial infections
medicines.warnings: Higher risk of diarrhea. Complete full course.

medicines.usage: For respiratory infections, skin infections, and STDs
medicines.warnings: May cause QT prolongation. Complete full course.

medicines.usage: For respiratory infections, acne, and tick-borne diseases
medicines.warnings: Take with plenty of water. Avoid sun exposure.

medicines.usage: For urinary tract infections and bacterial infections
medicines.warnings: Risk of tendon rupture. Avoid with certain medications. Not for children.

medicines.usage: For respiratory infections, UTIs, and skin infections
medicines.warnings: Black box warning for tendon rupture and nerve damage.

medicines.usage: For UTIs, respiratory infections, and traveler's diarrhea
medicines.warnings: May cause severe skin reactions. Avoid in sulfa allergy.

medicines.usage: For serious bacterial infections
medicines.warnings: May cause C. difficile colitis. Monitor for diarrhea.

medicines.usage: For serious gram-positive infections
medicines.warnings: Hospital use only. Requires monitoring.

medicines.usage: For treatment of intestinal worm infections
medicines.dosageAdult: 400mg single dose, may repeat in 2 weeks
medicines.dosageChild: 200mg for children 1-2 years, 400mg for over 2 years
medicines.warnings: May cause liver enzyme elevation. Monitor blood counts.

medicines.usage: For treatment of intestinal parasites
medicines.dosageChild: 100mg once daily for 3 days for children over 2
medicines.warnings: Generally well tolerated. May cause abdominal discomfort.

medicines.usage: For river blindness, strongyloidiasis, and scabies
medicines.warnings: Not for COVID-19. May cause Mazzotti reaction.

medicines.usage: For treatment of uncomplicated malaria
medicines.dosageChild: Dose based on weight, 6 doses over 3 days
medicines.sideEffects: Headache, dizziness, nausea, loss of appetite
medicines.warnings: Take with fatty food for better absorption. Complete full course.

medicines.usage: For malaria prevention and treatment
medicines.dosageAdult: 500mg weekly for prevention, 1g then 500mg at 6, 24, 48 hours for treatment
medicines.warnings: Check for resistance in your area. May cause retinopathy.

medicines.usage: For malaria and nocturnal leg cramps
medicines.dosageAdult: 650mg every 8 hours for malaria, 200-300mg at bedtime for cramps
medicines.warnings: May cause cinchonism. Many drug interactions.

medicines.usage: For malaria prevention and treatment
medicines.dosageAdult: 250mg weekly for prevention, 750mg then 500mg at 6-8 hours for treatment
medicines.dosageChild: Not recommended for children under 3 months or under 5kg
medicines.warnings: May cause neuropsychiatric effects. Not for people with depression.

medicines.description: Benzodiazepine for anxiety and muscle relaxation
medicines.usage: For anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures
medicines.dosageChild: Not recommended for children under 6 months
medicines.warnings: High potential for dependence. Not for long-term use. Avoid alcohol.

medicines.usage: For anxiety disorders and panic attacks
medicines.warnings: High potential for abuse and dependence. Short-term use only.

medicines.usage: For anxiety, insomnia, and preoperative sedation
medicines.warnings: May cause dependence. Use with caution in elderly.

medicines.usage: For seizures, panic disorder, and anxiety
medicines.warnings: High potential for dependence. Not for long-term use.

medicines.usage: For generalized anxiety disorder
medicines.warnings: Takes 2-4 weeks to work. Not for immediate relief.

medicines.usage: For anxiety, tension, and as a sedative
medicines.warnings: Causes drowsiness. Avoid driving or operating machinery.

medicines.usage: For high blood pressure and heart failure
medicines.warnings: Can cause birth defects. Monitor potassium levels. May cause angioedema.

medicines.usage: For high blood pressure and heart failure
medicines.warnings: May cause angioedema. Monitor renal function.

medicines.usage: For hypertension, heart failure, and renal protection
medicines.warnings: May cause angioedema. Monitor potassium.

medicines.usage: For high blood pressure and diabetic nephropathy
medicines.warnings: Monitor potassium levels. May cause angioedema.

medicines.usage: For hypertension and heart failure
medicines.warnings: Monitor for hyperkalemia. Avoid in pregnancy.

medicines.usage: For hypertension and angina
medicines.warnings: May cause reflex tachycardia. Monitor blood pressure.

medicines.usage: For hypertension and angina
medicines.warnings: May cause reflex tachycardia. Avoid grapefruit.

medicines.usage: For hypertension, angina, and arrhythmias
medicines.warnings: May cause heart block. Monitor heart rate.

medicines.usage: For hypertension, angina, and arrhythmias
medicines.warnings: May cause heart block. Avoid with beta-blockers.

medicines.description: Beta blocker for hypertension and heart conditions
medicines.usage: For hypertension, angina, and heart failure
medicines.warnings: May cause bronchospasm. Not for abrupt withdrawal.

symptomMappings.notes: Good for hypertension with heart conditions

medicines.usage: For hypertension and angina
medicines.warnings: May cause bronchospasm. Monitor heart rate.

medicines.usage: For hypertension, anxiety, and migraine prevention
medicines.warnings: May cause bronchospasm. Not for asthmatics.

medicines.usage: For heart failure and hypertension
medicines.warnings: May cause severe hypotension. Monitor closely.

medicines.usage: For hypertension and heart failure
medicines.warnings: May cause bronchospasm. Monitor heart rate.

medicines.description: Diuretic for blood pressure and fluid retention
medicines.usage: For high blood pressure and edema
medicines.warnings: Monitor potassium levels. Take in morning to avoid nighttime urination.

medicines.usage: For edema, heart failure, and hypertension
medicines.warnings: Monitor electrolytes and kidney function. Potent diuretic.

medicines.usage: For heart failure, hypertension, and edema
medicines.warnings: Monitor potassium levels. May cause hormonal side effects.

medicines.usage: For blood sugar control in type 2 diabetes
medicines.warnings: Can cause lactic acidosis (rare but serious). Monitor kidney function.

medicines.usage: For type 2 diabetes blood sugar control
medicines.sideEffects: GI upset, metallic taste, vitamin B12 deficiency
medicines.warnings: Take with meals to reduce GI side effects.

medicines.usage: For blood sugar control in type 2 diabetes
medicines.warnings: May cause severe hypoglycemia. Monitor blood sugar closely.

medicines.usage: For type 2 diabetes blood sugar control
medicines.warnings: Take 30 minutes before meals. Monitor for hypoglycemia.

medicines.usage: For type 2 diabetes blood sugar control
medicines.sideEffects: Weight gain, edema, heart failure risk
medicines.warnings: May cause or worsen heart failure. Monitor weight.

medicines.usage: For type 2 diabetes blood sugar control
medicines.warnings: May cause pancreatitis. Monitor for joint pain.

medicines.usage: For type 2 diabetes blood sugar control
medicines.sideEffects: Genital yeast infections, urinary tract infections
medicines.warnings: May cause dehydration and ketoacidosis. Monitor renal function.

medicines.usage: For type 1 and type 2 diabetes
medicines.dosageChild: Individualized based on weight and blood sugar
medicines.warnings: Requires blood sugar monitoring. Risk of hypoglycemia.

medicines.usage: For high cholesterol and cardiovascular prevention
medicines.warnings: Monitor liver function. Avoid grapefruit. Report muscle pain immediately.

medicines.usage: For hypercholesterolemia and cardiovascular prevention
medicines.warnings: Monitor liver function. Avoid grapefruit. Report muscle pain.

medicines.usage: For high cholesterol and cardiovascular risk reduction
medicines.sideEffects: Muscle pain, liver enzyme elevation, diabetes risk
medicines.warnings: Most potent statin. Monitor closely for side effects.

medicines.usage: For hypercholesterolemia and prevention of cardiovascular events
medicines.warnings: Generally well tolerated. Monitor liver function.

medicines.usage: For high cholesterol alone or with statins
medicines.warnings: Often used with statins. Monitor liver function.

medicines.usage: For prevention of blood clots and stroke
medicines.warnings: Requires regular INR monitoring. Many drug and food interactions.

medicines.usage: For cardiovascular protection and stroke prevention
medicines.warnings: Not for everyone. Consult doctor before starting.

medicines.usage: For vitamin C deficiency and immune support
medicines.sideEffects: Rare, may cause diarrhea at high doses
medicines.warnings: Generally safe. High doses may cause kidney stones in susceptible individuals.

symptomMappings.notes: May help with fatigue from deficiency

medicines.usage: For iron deficiency anemia
medicines.warnings: Take on empty stomach for better absorption. May stain teeth.

medicines.usage: For bone health and calcium deficiency
medicines.warnings: Take with meals for better absorption. Don't exceed recommended dose.

symptomMappings.notes: May help with muscle cramps from deficiency

medicines.usage: For general health and nutritional support
medicines.warnings: Don't exceed recommended daily dose. Not a substitute for healthy diet.

medicines.description: Fish oil supplement for heart and brain health
medicines.usage: For cardiovascular health and inflammation
medicines.warnings: May interact with blood thinners. Choose purified brands.

symptomMappings.notes: May help with inflammatory joint pain

medicines.usage: For digestive health and immune support
medicines.warnings: Refrigerate after opening. May interact with antibiotics.

medicines.usage: For immune system support and cold prevention
medicines.warnings: Not for long-term use. May interact with immune-suppressing drugs.

medicines.description: Herbal remedy for nausea and digestion
medicines.usage: For nausea, motion sickness, and digestive support
medicines.warnings: Generally safe. May interact with blood thinners.

medicines.usage: For cardiovascular health and immune support
medicines.sideEffects: Bad breath, body odor, digestive upset
medicines.warnings: May increase bleeding risk. Stop before surgery.

medicines.usage: For inflammation and joint health
medicines.warnings: May interact with blood thinners. Choose with black pepper for absorption.

medicines.usage: For insomnia and anxiety
medicines.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Avoid with alcohol or sedatives.

medicines.usage: For sleep disorders and jet lag
medicines.warnings: May cause drowsiness. Start with low dose.

medicines.usage: For mood, sleep, and anxiety
medicines.warnings: May interact with antidepressants. Not for people with liver disease.

medicines.description: Mineral supplement for muscle and nerve function
medicines.usage: For magnesium deficiency and muscle health
medicines.warnings: May cause diarrhea. Start with low dose.

medicines.usage: For immune support and wound healing
medicines.warnings: May interfere with copper absorption. Don't exceed recommended dose.

medicines.usage: For antioxidant support and thyroid health
medicines.sideEffects: Garlic breath, hair loss, nail changes
medicines.warnings: Toxic in high doses. Don't exceed recommended amount.

medicines.usage: For heart health and energy production
medicines.warnings: May interact with blood pressure medications and warfarin.

medicines.usage: For memory, circulation, and cognitive health
medicines.warnings: May increase bleeding risk. Stop before surgery.

medicines.description: Herbal adaptogen for energy and stress
medicines.usage: For energy, stress, and immune support
medicines.warnings: May interact with blood thinners and diabetes medications.

symptomMappings.notes: May help with energy and stress

medicines.description: Adaptogenic herb for stress and energy
medicines.usage: For stress reduction, energy, and vitality
medicines.warnings: May lower blood sugar and blood pressure. Monitor if on medications.

medicines.usage: For mental fatigue, stress, and physical performance
medicines.warnings: May be stimulating. Avoid taking late in the day.

medicines.usage: For memory, focus, and cognitive health
medicines.warnings: May enhance effects of stimulants and sedatives.

medicines.description: Amino acid for relaxation and focus
medicines.usage: For stress, anxiety, and mental focus
medicines.sideEffects: Generally well tolerated, rare stomach upset
medicines.warnings: May enhance effects of caffeine and blood pressure medications.

medicines.description: Calming herb for anxiety and sleep
medicines.usage: For anxiety, stress, and sleep problems
medicines.warnings: May interact with sedatives. Use with caution if thyroid issues.
